data.introduce: 实时查询座位图服务提供查看航班座位示意图的功能，以方便代理人在线实现为旅客预定航班座位的要求。
data.functions:
本服务支持的功能如下：
1、根据航班号、舱位、航班的起飞时间和航班的起始到达城市来查询座位图
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirSeatMapRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航空座位图显示请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"RequestorID","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"请求者代码","children":[{"name":"CompanyName","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"公司代码","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"SeatMapRequests","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"座位图查询请求集合","children":[{"name":"SeatMapRequest","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"座位图查询请求","children":[{"name":"FlightSegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"可用舱位信息","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"舱位代码（例如：K）","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"飞机型号","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"出发时间","children":[],"default":""},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","description":"航班号","children":[],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""}],"default":""},{"name":"@SysType","type":"object","quantity":"1","description":"系统类型:B,C;","children":[],"default":"C"}],"default":""}]
data.responseSchema:
[{"name":"OTA_AirSeatMapRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空座位图显示响应信息","children":[{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"SeatMapResponses","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位图响应集合","children":[{"name":"SeatMapResponse","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位图响应","children":[{"name":"FlightSegmentInfo","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：PEK）","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"BookingClassAvail","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"可用舱位信息","children":[{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"舱位代码（例如：K）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Equipment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"机型信息","children":[{"name":"@AirEquipType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"飞机型号","children":[]},{"name":"@ChangeofGauge","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"是否换过飞机","children":[]}]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"出发时间","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航班号","children":[]}]},{"name":"SeatMapDetails","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位图详情","children":[{"name":"CabinClass","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"舱内座位","children":[{"name":"AirRows","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位行集合","children":[{"name":"AirRow","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位行","children":[{"name":"AirSeats","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位集合","children":[{"name":"AirSeat","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"座位","children":[{"name":"@SeatNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位号（一般为大写英文字母）：不存在时表示该位置不是座位","children":[]},{"name":"@SeatStatus","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位状态：
                        ' ':No seat or
                        unknown status
                        '*':availalbe
                        'X':unavailable
                        'E':exit
                        '=':aisle
                        '/':AVAILABLE_NONRECLINING_SEAT
                        'B':AVAILABLE_FOR_PAX_REQUEST_BASSINET
                        'H':AVAILABLE_FOR_PAX_HANDICAPPED
                        'N':AVAILABLE_BUT_CAN_NOT_SEE_MOVIE
                        '#':ABP_AUTHORIZED
                        '.':ABP_ISSUED
                        '!':RESERVED
                        'C':UNAVAILABLE_BUFFER_ZONE_SEAT
                        'M':MULTIPLE_SEAT_TYPES
                        'I':INFANT
                        'S':SMOKE","children":[]},{"name":"@SeatPosition","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"座位位置：
                        L：Left
                        R：Right","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@RowNumber","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"行号，不存在时表示该行不是座位","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@CabinType","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"仓位类型","children":[]},{"name":"@Name","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"仓位名称","children":[]},{"name":"@Upstairs","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"上层座位标识","children":[]},{"name":"@StartingRow","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"起始行号","children":[]},{"name":"@EndingRow","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"结束行号","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TravelerRefNumberRPHs","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"乘客引用列表","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误信息集合","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@EchoToken","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@TimeStamp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Version","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@Target","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]},{"name":"@SequenceNmbr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[]}]}]

qaApiDemos.request:
<OTA_AirSeatMapRQ SysType="C">
    <POS>
        <Source PseudoCityCode="BJS191">
            <RequestorID>
                <CompanyName Code="MU"></CompanyName>
            </RequestorID>
        </Source>
    </POS>
    <SeatMapRequests>
        <SeatMapRequest>
            <FlightSegmentInfo DepartureDateTime="2017-10-10T07:00:00" FlightNumber="5183">
                <DepartureAirport LocationCode="PEK"></DepartureAirport>
                <ArrivalAirport LocationCode="PVG"></ArrivalAirport>
                <MarketingAirline Code="MU"></MarketingAirline>
                <BookingClassAvail ResBookDesigCode="Y"></BookingClassAvail>
            </FlightSegmentInfo>
        </SeatMapRequest>
    </SeatMapRequests>
</OTA_AirSeatMapRQ>
